patterns: How do I create an event?
responses: Creating an event on Socialite is easy! Go to the 'Create' tab, fill in the event details like title, date, location, and description. Then hit 'Publish' and your event will be live!
To host an event, tap the 'Create' button, enter your event information, add any tickets or registration details, and publish. It's that simple to get your event out there!

patterns: How to register for an event?
responses: To register for an event, find the event you're interested in, tap on it to view details, then click the 'Register' or 'Buy Tickets' button. Follow the prompts to complete your registration.
Joining an event is simple! Browse events, select the one you like, and tap 'Register'. You may need to provide some information or purchase a ticket, depending on the event type.

patterns: How do I cancel my registration?
responses: To cancel your registration, go to 'My Events', find the event you want to cancel, and tap 'Cancel Registration'. Refund policies vary by event, so check the event details for more information.

If you can't attend an event, you can cancel your registration in 'My Events'. Select the event and choose 'Cancel Registration'. Remember to check the event's cancellation policy for any refund details.

patterns: What types of events are there?
responses: Socialite hosts a wide variety of events! You can find categories like Music, Sports, Arts, Technology, Food & Drink, Networking, and many more. Explore our categories to find events that interest you!
We have events for all interests! From concerts and sports games to workshops and networking meetups. Check out our category list in the 'Explore' tab to see the full range of event types.
